Program_Title: Part 2: Northwest Arkansas Solutions Lab 2010: Building Sustainability

Headlines: Nearly 100 retail suppliers and sustainability experts convened in November 2010 at the University of Arkansas to discuss latest trends in retail supply-chain sustainability. Co-hosted by Environmental Defense Fund (EDF), the university's Center for Applied Sustainability, the Retail Industry Leaders Association and others, this event was part of the 2010 Solutions Lab series. Speakers included Vonda Lockwood, Zach Freeze, and Lea Jepson, WalMart; Michelle Harvey and Elizabeth Sturcken, EDF; Chip Jones, Dean Foods; Greg Van Buskirk, Clorox; Catherine Greener, Cleargreen Advisors; and Sean Stephan, Waste Management. To learn more, visit www.gibn.org.
